name: Solas VR
summary: Solas Meditation is the VR app that goes beyond meditation as we know it. With an immersive gallery of landscapes, nature sounds and guidance, Solas VR meditation replicates the real feeling of being out there, close to nature, enjoying the inner calmness we are made for. Bringing together eternal wisdom and cutting edge technology, Solas Meditation is designed for urban living, as a shield against stress, confusion and rush. The graphics and sounds, provided directly by nature, create a seamless...
